greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of integer partitions of n whose greatest common divisor is a prime number.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} A143519(d) * A000041(n/d). - _Andrew Howroyd_, Jun 22 2018
program: (PARI) seq(n)={dirmul(vector(n, n, numbpart(n)), dirmul(vector(n, n, moebius(n)), vector(n, n, isprime(n))))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Jun 22 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jun 22 2018
